text: The Black Phone is a 2021 American supernatural horror movie. It was directed by Scott Derrickson. The movie was written by Derrickson and C. Robert Cargill. It is based on the 2004 short story of the same name by Joe Hill. The movie stars Mason Thames, Madeleine McGraw, Jeremy Davies, James Ransone and Ethan Hawke. The movie is about a kidnapped teenager and how he uses a mysterious telephone to talk with the dead victims of his kidnapper "The Grabber". The movie was released by Universal Pictures in the United States on June 24, 2022.
